tool_description: Paddle API permit you to consult the paddle ranking and obtain detailed information of each player
title: Paddle

api_list.name: Get Player by Name
api_list.description: Get player information searched by name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paddle9.p.rapidapi.com/prod/players/name/{name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paddle9.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Player by Position
api_list.description: Consult a ranking position and get the player data. If there are two players sharing the same position, both of them are returned
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paddle9.p.rapidapi.com/prod/players/ranking/{number}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paddle9.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Ranking
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paddle9.p.rapidapi.com/prod/players/ranking"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paddle9.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
